snippet: A nexus of scandals has either dealt a blow to or highlighted the kind of graft that has permeated much of Eastern and Central Europe since the fall of Communism.
abstract: Departing Czech Prime Min Petr Necas and Jana Nagyova, his chief of staff, are embroiled in political scandal that has riveted Czech Republic; scandal has already polarized political class and brought down the government after the biggest anticorruption operation in decades turned up $8 million in cash and stores of gold that prosecutors suspect were used in kickback schemes.
lead_paragraph: A nexus of scandals has either dealt a blow to or highlighted the kind of graft that has permeated much of Eastern and Central Europe since the fall of Communism.

headline.main: Hints of Personal Intrigue In Czech Graft Scandal
headline.print_headline: Hints of Personal Intrigue In Czech Graft Scandal
